Package org.slim3.jdo

Slim3 JDO.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FilterCriterion A criterion interface for filtering.
OrderCriterion A criterion interface for order.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCriterion An abstract class for criterion.
AscCriterion An implementation class for "ascending" order criterion.
AttributeComparator A Comparator for attribute value.
AttributeMeta A meta data of attribute.
ContainsCriterion An implementation class for "contains" filter criterion.
CurrentPersistenceManager A class to hold the current persistence manager.
DescCriterion An implementation class for "descending" order criterion.
EqCriterion An implementation class for "equal" filter criterion.
GeCriterion An implementation class for "greater equal" filter criterion.
GenericDao<M> A generic dao.
GtCriterion An implementation class for "greater than" filter criterion.
JDOFilter Filter for JDO.
LeCriterion An implementation class for "less equal" filter criterion.
LtCriterion An implementation class for "less than" filter criterion.
ModelMeta<T> A meta data of model.
PersistenceManagerProxy The proxy of persistence manager.
PMF A helper class for PersistenceManagerFactory.
S3Blob The blob class to store large array of bytes.
S3ClassLoaderResolver The resolver of ClassLoader for Slim3.
S3DatastorePersistenceManagerFactory The persistence manager factory for Slim3.
S3MetaDataManager The meta data manager for Slim3.
S3OMFContext The object manager context for Slim3.
S3PersistenceManagerFactory The persistence manager factory for Slim3.
S3Text The text class to store large string.
SelectQuery<M> A query class for select clause.
StartsWithCriterion An implementation class for "startsWith" filter criterion.
